page.title: 06ARNPRIOR SCHOOL
page.content: In addition to its teaching staff the school has an excellent cook, a kitchen assistant, a school helper and a cleaner. Most of the children have lunch at school and are given a small bottle of milk in mid morning. The school has a netball team and a five_a_side football team and these compete against teams from other small schools in the district. The annual sports day is shared with Port of Mentieth School. Similarly, the pupils join with children from many other schools in festivals of Scottish country dancing, modern dancing and recorder playing. The older children also travel to Stirling for swimming lessons. Despite the small size of the school, therefore, the pupils enjoy a good breadth of experience and typically do well when they go on to high school.
